rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The phrase 'aware of one affected house' is factual reporting, not high-potency framing.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports the scope of the affected area.
'only aware of one affected house...which is one of the thousands of farms' uses minimiser 'only' with scale contrast 'thousands of farms'.
